title: 36Kr Hosts a Standout WISE 2025 Business Kings Conference, Showcasing Technology Innovation, Long-Term Value Creation and Business Leadership
description: BEIJING, Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- 36Kr Holdings Inc. ('36Kr' or the 'Company') (NASDAQ: KRKR), a prominent brand and pioneering platform dedicated to serving New Economy participants in China, today announced a successful WISE 2025 Business Kings Conference, held on November 27-28, 2025, in the Transmission Space at Beijing’s 798 Art District. Themed 'The Scenery Here is Exceptionally Beautiful,” WISE 2025 reimagined the traditional business conference format through a seven-act, short-play-inspired agenda, bringing together business leaders and innovators from a variety of sectors, including intelligent hardware, artificial intelligence, life sciences, retail, and investment. Covered by over 80 media outlets and livestreamed by 21 digital media platforms, the event achieved broad market visibility, garnering an impressive 500 million-plus views.

title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT updated to make images better and faster
description: OpenAI is rolling out an update to ChatGPT that's intended to generate images better and faster, the latest move by the artificial intelligence developer to bolster its flagship chatbot amid heated competition from Alphabet Inc's Google.

title: With freebies, OpenAI, Google vie for Indian users and training data
description: BENGALURU, Dec 17 (Reuters) - OpenAI, Google and Perplexity have begun an unprecedented fight for artificial intelligence users in India, rolling out freebies in a strategy seen as a way to harvest troves of multilingual training data in the world's most populous nation.

title: AI Powerhouses Offer Freebies to Capture India's Growing Market
description: OpenAI, Google, and Perplexity are competing for artificial intelligence users in India by offering free plans. This strategy aims to acquire invaluable multilingual training data. Companies like Reliance Jio and Airtel provide platforms for reaching millions of users, significantly boosting engagement and filling gaps in AI models.
content: The competition among AI giants OpenAI, Google, and Perplexity has intensified, particularly in India, where they're offering free plans to engage a vast pool of users. This strategy is part of an effort to gather valuable multilingual training data ... [631 chars]
